page.title: 15CHRISTOPHER'S GALA DAY
page.content: June 1st was Crossford Gala Day. I awoke feeling nervous because I was in the 5-a-side football final. First I dressed in my pirate outfit, for I was to follow the cub float, HMS MARS BAR, in the parade down Main Street. Later I changed into my football strip before eating my picnic lunch and going round all the stalls and looking at the displays. Then it was time for my match, the 10s to 12s final. I was playing in goal for my team, had only a few saves to make, but the score was 0-0 at the final whistle. It all depended on penalties! Our team scored with their first, so it was up to me to try to save our opponents' shot. I took up my stance on the line, and when I dived I shut my eyes as I didn't want to see the ball go in. But it missed! It went over the bar!{I had won my medal!}
